items.q: Do I need to buy a Powerbook to use the app?
items.a: No. You can use Powerbook without the physical notebook. The printed Powerbook simply gives you an optimized writing experience and a smoother workflow.

items.q: Where are my data and scans stored?
items.a: Your data is stored on EU servers. We use transport encryption (TLS), store only what's necessary, and you can delete your data at any time.
Yes. All your scans are private.

items.q: Do I need internet to scan?
items.a: No. Scans also work offline and sync once you're back online.
Yes. Powerbook works on iOS, Android, and in your browser.
You can start for free. Pricing for advanced features and the physical Powerbook is available on our website.

items.q: Can I connect Powerbook with other tools?
items.a: Optionally, you can enable integrations (e.g. calendar or tasks). Your consent is required and you can revoke it anytime.

items.q: Can I export or share my scans?
items.a: Yes. You can export pages as PDF/JPG and share them through your preferred apps or services.
